Key Arguments: The proposed legislation is an assault on free speech, a fundamental human right.
Misinformation and disinformation are subjective terms that can be manipulated.
The best way to counter false statements is through evidence and argumentation, not censorship.
Censorship during the pandemic led to distrust and extreme positions.
The legislation could be misused by those in power to suppress political rivals.
Notable Quotes: The antidote to the spreading of statements that are untrue or wrong is to respond to them with clear evidence and arguments to show that they are wrong or not true.
It is actually more dangerous to censor than to allow everyone to speak.
Please reject this harmful legislation. It is not needed and it tramples over the most basic human rights.
